    • Method Detail

      • accessFlickr

        public void accessFlickr()

      • collect

        public boolean collect(java.util.TreeSet<java.lang.String> searchterms,
              java.lang.Integer samplesize)
        incremental tagset collection for Flickr photos returned for searchterms. takes the words from "searchterms", issues one photosearch on Flickr per word, collects the tagssets from the results for the next "samplesize" photos in the results and stores them in a database. there is one table per word from wordlist in the database. columns are photos, first row is Flickr photo ID, second row is photo url remaining rows contain one tag per cell (Flickr allows max 75 tags per photo)
        Parameters:
        searchterms - the words to be searched for on Flickr
        samplesize - how many results should be processed, 0 means all results
